usage_points:
`#points (user) 1`  - set the points of a user
`#points (user) +1` - increase the points of a user
`#points (user) -1` - decrease the points of a user
`#points (user) 0` -  reset the points of a user
`#points reset` - resets all points
rank_description: View yours or someone else's server rank card.
24/7_description: Toggles the 24/7 mode, this makes the bot don't leave the voice channel until you stop it.
clear_description: Limpa as mensagens de um canal.
moveme_description: Move-o para um canal de voz.
id_description: Veja o seu cartão de classificação do servidor ou de outra pessoa.
profile_description: Ver o seu cartão de perfil global pessoal personalizável ou o cartão de perfil global personalizável de outra pessoa.
top_description: Exibir membros com a maior pontuação de servidor ou XP global.
user_description: Mostra informações, como ID e data de adesão, sobre você ou um usuário.
roles_description: Obtenha uma lista de funções do servidor e contagens de membros.
vkick_description: Expulsa um membro de um canal de voz
mute_description: Silenciar um membro dos canais de texto para que ele não possa digitar.
unmute_description: Desativa o som de um membro.
vmute_description: Silenciar um membro dos canais de voz para que ele não possa falar.
unvmute_description: Desativa o som de um membro dos canais de voz.
move_description: Move um membro para um canal de voz.
role_description: Adicionar/remover um usuário para uma função ou funções.
setcolor_description: Altera as cores das funções por códigos hexadecimais.
warnings_description: Recebe avisos para o servidor ou usuário.
setnick_description: Altera o apelido de um membro.
play_description: Adiciona uma música à fila e toca.
search_description: Procura resultados no YouTube para reproduzir.
queue_description: Exibe a fila das faixas atuais na lista de reprodução.
stop_description: Pára a música actual e limpa toda a fila de música.
pause_description: Pausa a faixa atualmente sendo reproduzida.
np_description: Mostra qual música o bot está tocando atualmente.
seek_description: Busca um certo ponto na faixa atual.
credits_description: Mostra o seu equilíbrio ou o de alguém.
support_description: Obter o nosso servidor de suporte convidar link.
title_description: Altera o seu título no comando #profile.
reset_description: Resetar texto/voz/invites xp pontos para todos os membros.
rep_description: Atribua um ponto de reputação a alguém. Só pode ser usado uma vez a cada 24 horas.
vip_description: Exibe informações sobre seu bot premium.
ping_description: Teste o tempo de resposta do bots.
points_description: Um servidor baseado em pontos que podem ser dados pelos moderadores.
ROLES_MAX_LIMIT: As funções podem saltar o limite máximo
MAX_LIMIT_NO_SKIP: O limite máximo não pode ser ignorado.
NO_TIME_ACTION: Ação se o tempo não for especificado
AUTO_INVOCATION: Mensagem de invocação de comando de exclusão automática
AUTO_DELETE_REPLY: Apagar automaticamente a mensagem de resposta do bot após 5 segundos
WELCOME_MESSAGE: Enviar uma mensagem quando um usuário entra no servidor
WELCOME_IMAGE: Enviar uma imagem quando um usuário entra no servidor
EDIT_IT_USING_MOUSE: Você pode usar o mouse para editá-lo.
voice_joined: Membro Ingressou no Canal de Voz
voice_left: Canal de Voz Esquerda do Membro
voice_switched: Membro comutado entre canais de voz
voice_move: Member moved to another voice channel
message_on_link_request: Mensagem para enviar para o servidor quando o link é solicitado
message_on_link_field: Mensagem para enviar ao servidor quando o link não pode ser enviado
text_with_link: Texto com a mensagem de link
link_limit: Quantos links devem poder ser solicitados antes do tempo de espera
link_wait_message: Mensagem para enviar ao servidor para o tempo de espera
link_invite_permission: Qualquer pessoa que tenha a permissão de 'convidar membros'.
link_auto_delete: Exclusão automática da mensagem Usuário & Bot após 5 segundos
voice_mute_time: tempo de silêncio de voz manual
ACTION_IF_ROLE: Ação se o limite de funções for excedido
ACTION_IF_CHANNELS: Ação se o limite de canais for excedido
ACTION_IF_KICK: Ação se o limite de chute for excedido
ACTION_IF_BAN: Medidas a tomar se o limite de proibição for ultrapassado
PERMISSIONS_ALL: Remover todas as permissões administrativas de todas as funções
PERMISSIONS_USER: Remover permissões administrativas das funções do usuário
REMOVE_ROLES: Remover o membro das funções administrativas
PROTECTED_HINT: é recomendado adicionar %EVERYONE% + o papel auto
ACTION_WHEN_PROTECTED: Action when protected role is updated/deleted
UNDO_REMOVE_ALL: Desfazer a ação + Remover todas as permissões administrativas de todas as funções
PROTECT_BOT_JOINED: Ação quando um bot entra no servidor
REMOVE_ADMIN_BOT: Remove all administrative permissions from the bot roles
BOTS_HINT: Isto irá proteger o seu servidor de bots desconhecidos.
DELETE_WITH_MESSAGE_DELETION: Apagar automaticamente com eliminação de mensagem
AUTOMOD_ONLY_YOUTUBE: Somente Canais de Links do YouTube:
LOGOUT_CONFIRM: Tens a certeza que queres sair?
BOT_GIVEN_A_ROLE: Ação quando o bot atribuiu um papel administrativo
GUILD_UPDATE_ACTION: Ação quando o nome/icon do servidor foi alterado
PROTECTION_ACCESS: Quem pode acessar o painel de controle do ProBot?
PROTECTION_ACCESS_ANY_ADMINISTRATOR: Qualquer membro com permissão do Administrador
PROTECTION_ACCESS_MEMBERS: Proprietário + Membros específicos com permissão do Administrador
PROTECTION_ONLY_OWNER: Restringir as propriedades de proteção ao proprietário do servidor
UNSAVED_CONFIRM: Cuidado - você tem mudanças não salvas!
MOD_UNTIL_LEAVES: Até o membro deixar o servidor
AUTO_ROLES_NOTE: Por solicitação da comunidade, o AutoRole só funciona se a função não tiver permissões administrativas.
CHANNELS_LIMIT_HINT: This limit will apply on channel create/update/delete events.
ROLE_LIMIT_HINT: This limit will apply on role create/update/delete events.
index_feature_1_description: Our welcomer welcomes users via a ready-to-use designs and customizble designs
index_feature_2_description: detect raid behavior and respond automatically at various levels
index_feature_3_description: Let the bot respond to any trigger words
index_feature_4_description: ProBot's automod system detect bad users' behaviour and take actions on them
index_feature_6_description: You don't have to worry about downtimes, ProBot is online!
index_premium_1_description: Youtube, SoundCloud, http urls, viemo, Mixed and many supported websites
index_premium_2_description: Specify channels for pictures or YouTube links only
index_premium_3_description: Always growing simple yet powerful moderation utilities. Putting you back in control of your community.
index_premium_4_description: Credits, profile, daily and many more.
index_premium_5_description: React to a message to get a role! Add as many reaction roles as you want to your message! Empower your users.
index_premium_6_description: Advanced log for all actions performed on your discord server and users
index_join2: see latest updates and new features
index_premium_description: ProBot's goal is to serve your discord server the way you want
why_probot_text: A very customizable multipurpose bot for welcome image, In-depth logs, Social commands, Music, Moderation and many more ...
undone_unrefund: This action can not be undone / refund.
index_card1_description: ProBot lets you design your own welcome images that includes user avatar and user name and welcomes your users for you!
index_card2_description: Be more creative with ProBot and send embeds in any channel, any time! We let your preview it before you send, and if you want to edit the same embed in the future you can!
index_card3_description: Enhance your Discord server with ProBot text and voice levels
index_card4_description: Manage your Discord server with plenty of useful moderation commands.
index_card5_description: DON'T MISS A BEAT! Listen to the music you GREW up with!
protection_autorole_removeall: Remove all administrative permissions when the AutoRole gets deleted (This protects you from the discord prune button)
tos_content:
The terms and conditions of our site serve as a guide for clients to show them how to use our site and how to use its services with ease.


#First: General conditions for ProBot site: -
1- All the terms and conditions mentioned on this page are applied to all users of the site.
2 - Once the client is registered on our site, it means that he completely agrees with the terms and conditions mentioned in this page and any terms that may be added in the future.
3 - All clients must certify that the personal data they provide to us is correct so that they can register on the site and get its services.
4 - We welcome the inquiries of all clients, and our technical support staff is ready to answer all inquiries of clients throughout the day.
5 - It is possible for us to change the terms and conditions at any time or add new ones, so we kindly ask clients to see them from time to time to be aware of any new terms that have been added.


#Second: Terms of Use of ProBot Website: -
1. The clients should provide us with all required information and data and it must be 100% accurate.
2. The site is not responsible for any damage caused to the client as a result of a misuse of our site or a sudden failure of our site.
3. It is forbidden to sell subscriptions to other people. Only the client has the right to use the bots.
4. It is prohibited to use our services in an unauthorized commercial use.
5- The user assures that his use of bots will not harm our site and will not violate the terms and conditions of our site.
6- The user assures that he is responsible for any violation issued from him, and he is responsible for this violation.
7- The administration of our site disclaims the responsibility for any damage or losses to the client as a result of his misuse of our site.
8- Our administration has the right to stop the subscription or account of a participant if he violates the terms and conditions of our site.

9- It is forbidden to deal outside the site, and any transactions must be done within the site so as not to occur any kind of fraud and cheating on clients.
10- It is forbidden to use our services in against law or cause harm to our site or to any other person.

#It is forbidden to use or reuse, copy or paste the services or content existed on the site of ProBot, and everything that exists on the site of ProBot is owned by the site alone, and any person violates these conditions, he will expose himself or his company or his site or his application for liability and prosecution by the administration of the site.
pp_content:
We thank our dear clients for reading our privacy policy page. We assure to our clients that their personal data and information will be completely secure on our site, because we are responsible for maintaining these data and we seek in every way to preserve it. Our privacy policy page includes some items as follows:

1- Data and information that we request from our clients:

ProBot site requests some data and information from the clients in order to be able to register on our site and use its services for example our site requests client's e-mail, his name and phone number and he should make a password for his account on our site and other information may be requested by our site.

2- The client's responsibility on our site:

The client is responsible for the safety of his account on our site. He should not provide anyone with sensitive information about his account such as giving someone the password of his account, which causes some damage to the client account. We advise our clients do not give any private information to other people.

3- How we protect our clients' data in our site:-

Our site follows the best procedures globally to protect our clients' personal data and information. Our site ensures to all clients that their data will be secure with us. Our site complies with the requirements of the European Union to protect the client data (GDPR).

: - 4- Client's financial rights in our site

Our site administration is keen on the financial rights of the clients. The balance will only appear to the client in the orders page. Our site will not provide anyone with the financial data of the clients

5- The uses of our site for clients' data: -

Our site uses the client data only to provide their services to them, when we obtain useful information to the site and develop its services. When we respond to the client inquiries, and when we carry out purchases.

6. We follow the European Union requirements to protect our client data:

The European Union has created a law that greatly helps to protect the client data. We work in all ways to preserve client data. This law allows to all clients to delete or modify their data when it occurs a breach of this data, and our site must report this breach within 72 hours of its occurrence.

7- Our site rights:-

Our site has the complete right to modify any item of its privacy policy page or add some new items to it in any time if our administrator sees that it is necessary to do this, so our dear clients, you should take a look from time to time to our privacy policy page to be aware off any changes made upon our privacy policy page.

8. Copyright of our site: -

It is strictly forbidden to copy or paste, use or reuse anything related to ProBot site, Any content existed in this site is belonged only to ProBot site. Any person copies, pastes, or uses any content or services of a ProBot site; he will expose himself or his site or his company to liability and prosecution by the administration of the site.
rp_content:
We guarantee to all clients that the replacement and refund process will be done easily with us; we work hard to satisfy all our dear clients. The clients can request a replacement service or refund within 7 days of the date of purchase with a condition that:
1- The replacement and refund process can only carry out to the person who bought the services from us.
2- The purchase must be confirmed by clarifying the order number and invoice.
3- When the client requests a replacement, he must not have used the purchased bots.
